commits.author: Doug Cutting
commits.sourceNew:
/** Returns the boost factor for hits on any field of this document. * *

The default value is 1.0. * *

Note: this value is not stored directly with the document in the index. * Documents returned from {@link IndexReader#document(int)} and {@link * Hits#doc(int)} may thus not have the same value present as when this field * was indexed. * * @see #setBoost(float) */ public float getBoost() { return boost; }
